mapper.select: SELECT a.zh_dm, a.zh_mc, b.zdr, a.user_id, a.ye FROM zh_detail_info a, zh_detail_creditcard b WHERE a.zh_dm = b.zh_dm AND a.yxbz='Y' AND b.zdr = #{zdr}
SELECT a.zh_dm, a.zh_mc, b.zdr, a.user_id, a.ye FROM zh_detail_info a, zh_detail_creditcard b WHERE a.zh_dm = b.zh_dm AND a.yxbz='Y' AND a.user_id = #{user_id}

SELECT uuid() AS billuuid, zh_dm, zh_mc, user_id, jysj, CONCAT(dl_mc,'-',xl_mc) jylx, jyf, je, bz FROM ( SELECT t.zh_dm as zh_dm, z.zh_mc as zh_mc, t.user_id as user_id, t.je as je , t.shijian as jysj, (SELECT dl_mc from dm_dl d where d.dl_dm = t.dl_dm) as dl_mc, (SELECT xl_mc from dm_xl x where x.xl_dm = t.xl_dm) as xl_mc, t.seller as jyf, t.bz as bz FROM account_payment_detail t, zh_detail_info z WHERE t.shijian > DATE_FORMAT(#{jyqq}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND t.shijian <= DATE_FORMAT(#{jyqz}, '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59') AND t.yxbz = 'Y' AND t.zh_dm = z.zh_dm AND t.zh_dm IN
#{dm}
union all
SELECT t.tgtZh_dm as zh_dm, z.zh_mc as zh_mc, t.user_id as user_id, -1.0*t.je as je, t.shijian as jysj, '还款' as dl_mc, '无' as xl_mc, CONCAT('还款账户','-',(select x.zh_mc from zh_detail_info x where x.zh_dm = t.srcZh_dm)) as jyf, t.bz as bz FROM account_transfer_detail t, zh_detail_info z WHERE t.shijian > DATE_FORMAT(#{jyqq}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND t.shijian <= DATE_FORMAT(#{jyqz}, '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59') AND t.yxbz = 'Y' AND t.tgtZh_dm = z.zh_dm AND t.tgtZh_dm IN
#{dm} ) as bill ORDER BY user_id, zh_dm, jysj desc
